results.question: Centripedal force is an apparent force that acts outward on a body moving around a center, arising from the body's inertia.
Hippopotomonstrosesquippedaliophobia is the irrational fear of long words.
Like with the Neanderthals, Homo sapiens sapiens also interbred with the Denisovans.
Water always boils at 100°C, 212°F, 373.15K, no matter where you are.
A defibrillator is used to start up a heartbeat once a heart has stopped beating.
In the periodic table, Potassium's symbol is the letter K.
Sugar contains fat.
The Neanderthals were a direct ancestor of modern humans.
Pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosis is a synonym for the disease known as silicosis.
An average human can go two weeks without water.
Steel is an alloy of Iron and Carbon.
Not including false teeth; A human has two sets of teeth in their lifetime.
Psychology is the science of behavior and mind.
Igneous rocks are formed by excessive heat and pressure.
An Astronomical Unit is the distance between Earth and the Moon.
The "Gympie Stinger" is the deadliest plant in the world.
The Doppler effect applies to light.
The most frequent subconscious activity repeated by the human body is blinking.
A person can get sunburned on a cloudy day.
The planet Mars has two moons orbiting it.
